field.name: summary
field.value: Do not allow non interface types in SemanticVerifierVisitor#GuessRelation

field.name: description
field.value:
When using a concrete type with HasMany, ActiveRecord throws the exception "Could not guess relation type for property A.B", as the property type wasn't any of IList, ISet or IDictionary (generic or not).
It should be enforced that, when not using an interface, it is not possible to continue. Attached is a patch that does the proper checking.
